Welcome to the **Introductory course on NGS data Analysis**. 

The website contains instructions and codes required for hands-on sessions of the course.

The practical sessions involves the given below tasks

1. Handling Fastq files
2. Quality Check using FastQC
3. Basics of R
4. Sample distribution assessment (using gene-expression data)
5. Differential gene-expression analysis
6. Gene-set enrichment analysis
